C

com.webnobis.configuration - package com.webnobis.configuration
 
com.webnobis.configuration.inject - package com.webnobis.configuration.inject
 
com.webnobis.configuration.transform - package com.webnobis.configuration.transform
 
Configuration - Class in com.webnobis.configuration
Configuration service to create and inject classes with configuration values or refresh injected values
ConfigurationFilesRootPath - Annotation Type in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
Root path to search for configuration files, also within the class path
ConfigurationLoader - Class in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
Loads configuration of all supported configuration files.
ConfigurationLoader(Charset) - Constructor for class com.webnobis.configuration.inject.ConfigurationLoader
 
ConfigurationTransformer - Class in com.webnobis.configuration.transform
Transforms configuration value (always String) to needed type (maybe int)
ConstructorInjector - Class in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
Injects all non-final constructor parameters with the current configurations, where the key matched by Named annotations value and the constructor has the Inject annotation.
ConstructorInjector(Map<String, String>) - Constructor for class com.webnobis.configuration.inject.ConstructorInjector
 
createWithConfigurations(Class<T>) - Static method in class com.webnobis.configuration.Configuration
 

F

FieldInjector - Class in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
Injects or overwrite all non-final and non-abstract fields with the current configurations, where the key matched by Named annotations value.
FieldInjector(Map<String, String>) - Constructor for class com.webnobis.configuration.inject.FieldInjector
 

G

getSupportedTypes() - Static method in class com.webnobis.configuration.transform.ConfigurationTransformer

Loads or refresh all configuration pairs.

M

MaxClassDepthReachedException - Exception in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
The max depth of recursion is reached.

MissingConfigurationException - Exception in com.webnobis.configuration.inject
Configuration is missed or the configuration key is unknown.
